section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In Number 76-5416, Jones against Hildebrant again for reason stated in an opinion.
And for the Court filed this morning, the petition for certiorari having been granted is now dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Mr. Justice White joined by Mr. Justice Brennan and Mr. Justice Marshall filed a dissenting opinion.
